phsproject

Source: R/phsproject.R
phsproject.Rd

Create new projects according to the PHS R project structure. This function is meant to be used within RStudio by going to the File menu, then New Project.

Usage

phsproject(
  path,
  author,
  n_scripts = 1,
  git = FALSE,
  renv = FALSE,
  overwrite = FALSE
)

Arguments

path

Filepath for the project.

author

Name of the main author for the project.

n_scripts

Number of code files to start the project with.

git

Initialise the project with Git.

renv

Initialise the project with package management using renv.

overwrite

Logical: Whether to overwrite directory at existing path when creating directory.

Value

New project created according to the PHS R project structure.

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
phsproject(path = file.path(getwd(), "testproj"), author = "A Person", n_scripts = 1)
} # }
